org.xlattice.corexml.bind

Class AttrBag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.corexml.bind.Ordering
      • org.xlattice.corexml.bind.AttrBag

  • public class AttrBag
extends Ordering
    Maintains an unordered set of AttrBindings.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AttrBag()
      Create the AttrBag and with it an empty set of AttrBindings.

      • apply

        protected void apply(Element elm,
         java.lang.Object o)
              throws CoreXmlException
        Use the ordering to generate a set of values from the attributes of an Element. The values obtained will be used to set fields in the object.
        Specified by:
        apply in class Ordering
        Parameters:
        elm - Element whose children values come from
        o - object in which values are assigned
        Throws:
        CoreXmlException

      • generate

        protected void generate(Element elm,
            java.lang.Object o)
                 throws CoreXmlException
        Use the AttrBag to create XML nodes. The ordering, the AttrBag, is used to draw values from the object. These values are used to set attributes in the Element. XXX A better implementation would support defaults and would not generate XML where the current value is the default.
        Specified by:
        generate in class Ordering
        Parameters:
        elm - Element to which attributes are assigned
        o - object from which values are drawn
        Throws:
        CoreXmlException
